00016 {
00017   for (unsigned int i=0; i<m_vertAdj.size(); ++i)
00018   {
00019     m_vertAdj[i]->m_vertAdj.erase(std::remove(m_vertAdj[i]->m_vertAdj.begin(), m_vertAdj[i]->m_vertAdj.end(), this),
00020                                   m_vertAdj[i]->m_vertAdj.end());

00044 void Vertex::remAdjFace(Triangle *_t)
00045 {

00051 void Vertex::remAdjVert( Vertex* _v)

00058 void Vertex::addAdjFace( Triangle* _t)
00059 {
00060   std::vector< Triangle *>::iterator it;
00061   it = std::find(m_faceAdj.begin(), m_faceAdj.end(), _t);
00062   if (it == m_faceAdj.end())
00063     m_faceAdj.push_back(_t);
00064 }

00066 void Vertex::addAdjVert( Vertex* _v)
00067 {
00068   std::vector< Vertex *>::iterator it;
00069   it = std::find(m_vertAdj.begin(), m_vertAdj.end(), _v);
00070   if (it == m_vertAdj.end())
00071     m_vertAdj.push_back(_v);
00072 }
00073 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00074 void Vertex::remIfNonNeighbour( Vertex* _v )
00075 {
00076   if(std::find(m_vertAdj.begin(), m_vertAdj.end(), _v) == m_vertAdj.end()) return;
00077 
00078   for (unsigned int i=0; i<m_faceAdj.size(); ++i)
00079   {
00080     if (m_faceAdj[i]->hasVert(_v)) return;
00081 
00082   }
00083   m_vertAdj.erase(std::remove(m_vertAdj.begin(), m_vertAdj.end(), _v),
00084                   m_vertAdj.end());
00085 }

00111 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 Triangle::~Triangle()
00113 {
00114   for (unsigned int i=0; i<3; ++i)
00115   {
00116     if (m_vert[i])
00117     {
00118       m_vert[i]->remAdjFace(this);
00119     }
00120   }
00121   for (unsigned int i=0; i<3; ++i)
00122   {
00123     int i2 = (i+1)%3;
00124     if(!m_vert[i] || !m_vert[i2]) continue;
00125 
00126     m_vert[i]->remIfNonNeighbour(m_vert[i2]);
00127     m_vert[i2]->remIfNonNeighbour(m_vert[i]);
00128   }
00129 }

00132 {
00133   return (_t.m_id == m_id &&
00134           _t.m_vert[0] == m_vert[0] &&
00135           _t.m_vert[1] == m_vert[1] &&
00136           _t.m_vert[2] == m_vert[2]);

00143           _t.m_vert[0] != m_vert[0] ||
00144           _t.m_vert[1] != m_vert[1] ||
00145           _t.m_vert[2] != m_vert[2]);

00179 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00180 void Triangle::calculateNormal()
00181 {
00182   // create two vectors v and w from the triangle's points
00183   ngl::Real v[3] = {( m_vert[1]->m_vert.m_x - m_vert[0]->m_vert.m_x ),
00184                     ( m_vert[1]->m_vert.m_y - m_vert[0]->m_vert.m_y ),
00185                     ( m_vert[1]->m_vert.m_z - m_vert[0]->m_vert.m_z )};
00186 
00187   ngl::Real w[3] = {( m_vert[2]->m_vert.m_x - m_vert[0]->m_vert.m_x ),
00188                     ( m_vert[2]->m_vert.m_y - m_vert[0]->m_vert.m_y ),
00189                     ( m_vert[2]->m_vert.m_z - m_vert[0]->m_vert.m_z )};
00190   // cross product the two vectors
00191   m_fNormal.m_x = (v[1]*w[2]) - (v[2]*w[1]);
00192   m_fNormal.m_y = (v[2]*w[0]) - (v[0]*w[2]);
00193   m_fNormal.m_z = (v[0]*w[1]) - (v[1]*w[0]);
00194   // if the length is zero, don't normalize
00195   if (m_fNormal.length() != 0)
00196   {
00197     m_fNormal.normalize();
00198   }
00199 }

00201 bool Triangle::hasVert( Vertex *_v )
00202 {
00203   std::vector< Vertex *>::iterator it;
00204   it = std::find(m_vert.begin(), m_vert.end(), _v);
00205   return (it != m_vert.end());
00206 }
00207 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00208 void Triangle::replaceVertex(Vertex *_u, Vertex *_v)
00209 {
00210   assert(_u && _v);
00211   assert(_u == m_vert[0] || _u == m_vert[1] || _u == m_vert[2]);
00212   assert(_v != m_vert[0] && _v != m_vert[1] && _v != m_vert[2]);
00213 
00214   std::vector< Vertex *>::iterator it;
00215   it = std::find(m_vert.begin(), m_vert.end(), _u);
00216   if (it != m_vert.end())
00217   {
00218     m_vert[std::distance(m_vert.begin(), it)] = _v;
00219   }
00220   _u->remAdjFace(this);
00221   assert(!_v->hasAdjFace(this));
00222   _v->addAdjFace(this);
00223   for (unsigned int i=0; i<3; i++)
00224   {
00225     _u->remIfNonNeighbour(m_vert[i]);
00226     m_vert[i]->remIfNonNeighbour(_u);
00227   }
00228 
00229   for (unsigned int i=0; i<3; i++)
00230   {
00231     assert(m_vert[i]->hasAdjFace(this)==1);
00232     for(unsigned int j=0; j<3; j++)
00233     {
00234       if (i != j &&
00235           std::find(m_vert.begin(), m_vert.end(), _v) != m_vert.end() &&
00236           !m_vert[i]->hasAdjVert(m_vert[j]))
00237       {
00238           m_vert[i]->m_vertAdj.push_back(m_vert[j]);
00239       }
00240     }
00241   }
00242   calculateNormal();
00243 }
